Source: https://gizmodo.com/fbi-director-deletes-tweet-about-arrest-of-wisconsin-judge-but-its-unclear-why-2000594375  Whatever the verdict may be, it feels like there’s a lot that’s not said yet.   Edit: Seth Abramson made a bluesky thread explaining the legality of all this: https://bsky.app/profile/sethabramson.bsky.social/post/3lnnhgymozs2w
